title: Air Fryer Chicken Thighs Recipe
description: These air fryer chicken thighs are incredibly juicy with crispy skin. Ready in 30 minutes, these tasty paprika-rubbed chicken thighs are always a hit!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond Everyday Cooking Cooking by Equipment Air Fryer Main Dishes Air Fryer Chicken Thighs 4.8 (172) 144 Reviews 19 Photos These air fryer chicken thighs are tender and juicy with delicious crispy skin. You'll love this quick and easy chicken thigh recipe that is ready in less than 30 minutes thanks to your trusty air fryer! By Brenda Venable Updated on January 7, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 19 19 19 19 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 20 mins Total Time: 30 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Jump to recipe If you've never made chicken thighs in the air fryer, you need this top-rated air fryer chicken thigh recipe in your life ASAP. The results are irresistible thighs that are tender and juicy on the inside, but nice and crispy on the outside. Air Fryer Chicken Thighs Ingredients Allrecipes These are the easy-to-find ingredients you'll need to make this air-fried chicken thighs recipe: · Chicken thighs: You'll need four skin-on, boneless chicken thighs.· Olive oil: Olive oil locks in moisture and gives the spices something to adhere to.· Spices and seasonings: These air-fried chicken thighs are seasoned with salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder. How to Make Air Fryer Chicken Thighs Once you make chicken thighs in the air fryer, you'll never go back to the oven again. You'll find a detailed ingredient list and step-by-step instructions in the recipe below, but let's go over the basics: How to Make Chicken Thighs In the Air Fryer Step-By-Step Here's a very brief overview of what you can expect when you make air fryer chicken thighs: 1. Pat the thighs dry and brush the skins with olive oil.2. Make the spice blend and sprinkle it all over the thighs.3. Cook in the preheated air fryer until the skin is brown and the juices run clear. How Long to Cook Chicken Thighs In the Air Fryer Boneless chicken thighs should be fully cooked after about 18 minutes in an air fryer preheated to 400 degrees F. Make sure you check the internal temperature before you serve — an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 165 degrees F. How to Serve Air Fryer Chicken Thighs Since your air fryer will be occupied, try pairing the chicken thighs with one of these simple side dishes that come together quickly in the oven or on the stove: · Oven-Roasted Asparagus· Basic Mashed Potatoes· Sautéed Green Beans Explore our entire collection of Side Dish Recipes. Air Fryer Chicken Thighs Storage Store the cooked chicken thighs in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to four days. If you plan to freeze the chicken, place the cooled thighs in a freezer bag and squeeze out the excess air. Wrap the bag in foil. Freeze for up to three months. Allrecipes Community Tips and Praise "Oh my, these were so good," according to grammyt7204g. "The skin was crispy and the chicken inside was so tender and cooked perfectly, I will definitely make these again!" "Every time I use my air fryer, I tell myself I should use it more!" raves Alyson. "Couldn’t believe chicken thighs only took 18 minutes to cook. Flavor was delicious! Will definitely make it again." "I omitted the black pepper and added a generous seasoning of lemon pepper," says Christina M. Miskam. "They came out juicy, delicious, and I added 3 minutes per side because my chicken thighs were huge. Perfect!" Editorial contributions by Corey Williams Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 skin-on, boneless chicken thighs 2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil 1 teaspoon smoked paprika ¾ teaspoon garlic powder ½ teaspoon salt ½ teaspoon ground black pepper Directions Gather all ingredients and preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pat chicken thighs dry with a paper towel and brush skins with olive oil. Place chicken thighs, skin-side down, in a single layer on a plate. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Combine smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Sprinkle 1/2 of the seasoning mixture evenly over thighs. Turn thighs over and evenly sprinkle with remaining seasoning. Arrange thighs, skin-side up, in a single layer in the air fryer basket. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook in the preheated air fryer until thighs are brown and the juices run clear, about 18 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Serve and enjoy! Add Your Photo Photos of Air Fryer Chicken Thighs 01 of 19 Photo by  Allrecipes 02 of 19 Photo by  grammyt7204g 08/17/2022 Oh my these were so good, the skin was crispy and the meat inside was so tender and cooked perfectly, I will definitely make these again.! 03 of 19 Photo by  Trisha Celes 01/14/2022 Turned out great! 04 of 19 Photo by  Kimberly Daugherty-Lekey 07/27/2021 05 of 19 Photo by  tkochel 06/11/2021 06 of 19 Photo by  H. Biondo 01/30/2021 07 of 19 Photo by  Tpodoloff 10/12/2020 Really good and moist! 08 of 19 Photo by  Megan Seymour 06/26/2020 i used a premade spice mix and used skinless thighs. its pretty good I'll definitely have to make it for our kids 09 of 19 Photo by  lisareighley 06/18/2020 10 of 19 Photo by  TOOKEC 03/25/2020 This was the first recipe I made after I got an air fryer lid for my InstantPot. The chicken was delicious and the skin was crisp. I thought the seasoning was perfect. I cooked the thighs skin-side up for 20 minutes, but they weren't quite done, so I turned them upside down and cooked them for another 6 minutes. That was enough to have the chicken thoroughly cooked. I got a thumbs-up from the guys in my family! 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Air Fryer Keto Chicken Wings 6 Ratings Air Fryer Chicken Thigh Schnitzel 17 Ratings Lemon-Garlic Air Fryer Salmon 22 Ratings Air Fryer Popcorn-Crusted Popcorn Chicken Air Fryer Korean Fried Chicken 2 Ratings Air Fryer Cornflake-Crusted Chicken Tenders 9 Ratings Keto Pecan-Crusted Pork Chops in the Air Fryer 8 Ratings Cajun Chicken Drumsticks 9 Ratings Air Fryer Blackened Chicken Breasts 90 Ratings Blackened Ranch Pan-Fried Chicken Thighs 15 Ratings Cajun Air Fryer Salmon 53 Ratings Crumbed Chicken Tenderloins (Air Fried) 198 Ratings Chicken Lazone 3 Ratings Easy Garlic and Rosemary Chicken 239 Ratings Lucky's Quickie Chickie 291 Ratings Mexican-Style Air Fryer Stuffed Chicken Breasts 7 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
